title: Ep. - 418 - MEREDITH MARKS FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF SALT LAKE CITY EXECUTIVE PRODUCER OF TWENTYSOMETHINGS: NETFLIX
description:
Meredith Marks from Real Housewives of Salt Lake City discusses the Jen Shah arrest and fallout, her relationships with Mary and Lisa, and why becoming part of the show helped her have more introspection about her career and marriage.

 

Ian Gelfand, Executive Producer of Twentysomethings: Austin, a new Netflix reality series with eight twenty-somethings set out to find success in life and love in Austin, Texas while learning to navigate the 'new normal' of 2020's America. Living together and leaning on each other, they experience the highs and lows that come with being an adult.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
